numbered_ace_sentences: 1. Some students have to work hard to get into a college.
3. I feel that it is unfair if a college passes over a student for a legacy applicant.
4. A legacy applicant with money has a 6x chance of getting chosen.
5. This fact makes me wonder how often a legacy applicant with generational wealth goes to a school.
6. The parents of the legacy applicant went to this school or the grandparents of the legacy applicant went to this school.
